template.text: Hello

,

 

Allow me to introduce myself; my name is Claudia Herrera and I work with Alberto Aguirre the BRM for Softtek at Genworth. Organizations are increasingly looking to balance their global sourcing strategy as risk mitigation and cost containment take a new dimension in today’s environment.

 

·         Do you have a solid strategy to Diversifying Risk?

·         Have you considered outsourcing as means to increasing productivity?

·         Do you know the benefits of NearShore® total cost of engagement (TCE) vs. Offshore rates?

·         Is it important for your business to establishing long term outsourcing partner relationships?

 

For many years Softtek has helped its customers answering these questions by leveraging our Global NearShore™ model. We firmly believe that during tough times, new opportunities arise. Let’s explore the possible areas of opportunity:

 

·         Rapid Time to Market - This could represent a 25% reduction in project time and similar reductions in cost.

·         QA & Testing - Improving overall user satisfaction and saving on average 30% over in-house testing.

·         Application Maintenance & Support (AMS) - If AMS is currently being done in-house, your cost savings could reach 40% of what you currently spend.

·         IT Infrastructure - On average, customers with in-house support save 40% or $400,000 for every $1,000,000 they currently spend.

 

I wanted to make you aware that we currently have a Master Services Agreement (MSA) signed with Genworth and we have been providing services to Retirement & Protection and Genworth Mexico for several years now (see presentation attached). In case you are not quite familiar with our company, we are Latin America’s largest global IT outsourcing company with over 25 years in business, over 30 offices around the world, and currently offering services to 17 Fortune 50 companies. Softtek created the NearShore® concept as an alternative to "traditional" offshore IT solutions. Customers leverage Mexico's proximity, cost structure, and international trade agreements such as NAFTA to provide companies with a more convenient and cost-effective alternative while reducing their outsourcing geographical risk. Softtek delivers services through very mature process and methodologies leveraging CMM and Six Sigma.  

 

If this is of interest, we would suggest a 20 minute introductory phone meeting.  You can reply by email directly to me and/or copy your assistant who I can work with to schedule a mutually convenient time.

 

Kind regards,

 

Claudia Herrera
